00020 #ifndef REIFY_TRUE_H
00021 #define REIFY_TRUE_H
00022 
00023 #include "constraint_abstract.h"
00024 #include "../memory_management/reversible_vals.h"
00025 #include "../get_info/get_info.h"
00026 #include "../queue/standard_queue.h"
00027 
00028 #ifdef P
00029 #undef P
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 //#define P(x) cout << x << endl
00033 #define P(x)
00034 
00035 template<typename BoolVar, bool DoWatchAssignment>
00036   struct reify_true : public ParentConstraint
00037 {
00038   virtual string constraint_name()
00039     { return "ReifyTrue:" + child_constraints[0]->constraint_name(); }
00040 
00041   BoolVar rar_var;
00042   bool constraint_locked;
00043 
00044   Reversible<bool> full_propagate_called;
00045 
00046   reify_true(StateObj* _stateObj, AbstractConstraint* _poscon, BoolVar _rar_var) :
00047   ParentConstraint(_stateObj), rar_var(_rar_var), constraint_locked(false),
00048     full_propagate_called(stateObj, false)
00049   {
00050     child_constraints.push_back(_poscon);
00051   }
00052 
00053   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00054   { D_FATAL_ERROR("You can't reverse a reified Constraint!"); }
00055 
00056   virtual int dynamic_trigger_count()
00057   {
00058     if(DoWatchAssignment)
00059       return child_constraints[0]->get_vars_singleton()->size()*2;
00060     else
00061       return 0;
00062   }
00063 
00064   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00065   {
00066     if(rar_var.inDomain(0))
00067     {
00068       D_ASSERT(get_vars()[child_constraints[0]->get_vars_singleton()->size()].inDomain(0));
00069       assignment.push_back(make_pair(child_constraints[0]->get_vars_singleton()->size(), 0));
00070       return true;
00071     }
00072 
00073     return child_constraints[0]->get_satisfying_assignment(assignment);
00074   }
00075 
00076   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00077   {
00078     DomainInt back_val = *(v + v_size - 1);
00079     //v.pop_back();
00080     if(back_val != 0)
00081       return child_constraints[0]->check_assignment(v, v_size - 1);
00082     else
00083       return true;
00084   }
00085 
00086   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00087   {
00088     vector<AnyVarRef> vec = child_constraints[0]->get_vars();
00089     vec.push_back(rar_var);
00090     return vec;
00091   }
00092 
00093   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00094   {
00095     triggerCollection triggers;
00096     triggers.push_back(make_trigger(rar_var, Trigger(this, -1), LowerBound));
00097     return triggers;
00098   }
00099 
00100   virtual void special_check()
00101   {
00102     D_ASSERT(constraint_locked);
00103     P("Special Check!");
00104     constraint_locked = false;
00105     child_constraints[0]->full_propagate();
00106     full_propagate_called = true;
00107   }
00108 
00109   virtual void special_unlock()
00110   {
00111     D_ASSERT(constraint_locked);
00112     P("Special unlock!");
00113     constraint_locked = false;
00114   }
00115 
00116   virtual void propagate(int i, DomainDelta domain)
00117   {
00118     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(ReifyTrue);
00119     P("Static propagate start");
00120     if(constraint_locked)
00121       return;
00122 
00123     if(i == -1)
00124     {
00125       P("rarvar assigned - Do full propagate");
00126       constraint_locked = true;
00127       getQueue(stateObj).pushSpecialTrigger(this);
00128       return;
00129     }
00130 
00131     if(full_propagate_called)
00132     {
00133       P("Already doing static full propagate");
00134       D_ASSERT(rar_var.isAssigned() && rar_var.getAssignedValue() == 1);
00135       pair<int,int> childTrigger = getChildStaticTrigger(i);
00136       D_ASSERT(childTrigger.first == 0);
00137       P("Passing trigger" << childTrigger.second << "on");
00138       child_constraints[0]->propagate(childTrigger.second, domain);
00139     }
00140   }
00141 
00142   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* trig)
00143   {
00144     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(ReifyTrue);
00145     P("Dynamic prop start");
00146     if(constraint_locked)
00147       return;
00148 
00149     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00150 
00151     if(DoWatchAssignment && trig >= dt && trig < dt + dynamic_trigger_count())
00152     {// Lost assignment, but don't replace when rar_var=0
00153       P("Triggered on an assignment watch");
00154       if(!full_propagate_called && !rar_var.isAssigned())
00155       {
00156         bool flag;
00157         GET_ASSIGNMENT(assignment, child_constraints[0]);
00158         PROP_INFO_ADDONE(ReifyImplyGetSatAssg);
00159 
00160         P("Find new assignment");
00161         if(!flag)
00162         { // No satisfying assignment to constraint
00163           P("Failed!");
00164           rar_var.propagateAssign(0);
00165           return;
00166         }
00167         P("Found new assignment");
00168         watch_assignment(assignment, *(child_constraints[0]->get_vars_singleton()), dt);
00169       }
00170       return;
00171     }
00172 
00173     if(full_propagate_called)
00174     {
00175       P("Pass triggers to children");
00176       D_ASSERT(rar_var.isAssigned() && rar_var.getAssignedValue() == 1);
00177       child_constraints[0]->propagate(trig);
00178     }
00179     else
00180     {
00181       P("Remove unused trigger");
00182       // This is an optimisation.
00183       releaseTrigger(stateObj, trig);
00184     }
00185   }
00186 
00187   template<typename T, typename Vars, typename Trigger>
00188   void watch_assignment(const T& assignment, Vars& vars, Trigger* trig)
00189   {
00190     for(int i = 0; i < assignment.size(); ++i)
00191     {
00192       D_ASSERT(vars[assignment[i].first].inDomain(assignment[i].second));
00193       if(vars[assignment[i].first].isBound()) {
00194         vars[assignment[i].first].addDynamicTrigger(trig + i, DomainChanged);
00195       } else {
00196         vars[assignment[i].first].addDynamicTrigger(trig + i, DomainRemoval, assignment[i].second);
00197       }
00198     }
00199 
00200   }
00201 
00202   virtual void full_propagate()
00203   {
00204     P("Full prop");
00205     P(child_constraints[0]->constraint_name());
00206     if(rar_var.isAssigned() && rar_var.getAssignedValue() > 0)
00207     {
00208       child_constraints[0]->full_propagate();
00209       full_propagate_called = true;
00210       return;
00211     }
00212 
00213     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00214     int dt_count = dynamic_trigger_count();
00215     // Clean up triggers
00216     for(int i = 0; i < dt_count; ++i)
00217       releaseTrigger(stateObj, dt);
00218 
00219     if(DoWatchAssignment && !rar_var.isAssigned()) //don't place when rar_var=0
00220     {
00221       bool flag;
00222       GET_ASSIGNMENT(assignment, child_constraints[0]);
00223       PROP_INFO_ADDONE(ReifyImplyGetSatAssg);
00224       if(!flag)
00225       { // No satisfying assignment to constraint
00226         rar_var.propagateAssign(0);
00227         return;
00228       }
00229       watch_assignment(assignment, *(child_constraints[0]->get_vars_singleton()), dt);
00230     }
00231   }
00232 };
00233 
00234 template<typename BoolVar>
00235 AbstractConstraint*
00236 truereifyCon(StateObj* stateObj, AbstractConstraint* c, BoolVar var)
00237 { return new reify_true<BoolVar, true>(stateObj, &*c, var); }
00238 
00239 template<typename BoolVar>
00240 AbstractConstraint*
00241 truereifyQuickCon(StateObj* stateObj, AbstractConstraint* c, BoolVar var)
00242 { return new reify_true<BoolVar, false>(stateObj, &*c, var); }
00243 
00244 template<typename VarArray>
00245 inline AbstractConstraint*
00246 BuildCT_REIFYIMPLY_NEW(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& vars, ConstraintBlob& bl)
00247 {
00248   D_ASSERT(bl.internal_constraints.size() == 1);
00249   D_ASSERT(vars.size() == 1);
00250   return truereifyCon(stateObj, build_constraint(stateObj, bl.internal_constraints[0]), vars[0]);
00251 }
00252 
00253 template<typename VarArray>
00254 inline AbstractConstraint*
00255 BuildCT_REIFYIMPLY_QUICK(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& vars, ConstraintBlob& bl)
00256 {
00257   D_ASSERT(bl.internal_constraints.size() == 1);
00258   D_ASSERT(vars.size() == 1);
00259   return truereifyQuickCon(stateObj, build_constraint(stateObj, bl.internal_constraints[0]), vars[0]);
00260 }
00261 
00262 
00263 template<typename VarArray>
00264 inline AbstractConstraint*
00265 BuildCT_REIFYIMPLY(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& vars, ConstraintBlob& bl)
00266 {
00267 #ifdef OLD_REIFYIMPLY
00268 #warning Using old Reifyimply
00269   return BuildCT_REIFYIMPLY_OLD(stateObj, vars, bl);
00270 #else
00271   return BuildCT_REIFYIMPLY_NEW(stateObj, vars, bl);
00272 #endif
00273 }

00275 #endif
